channel.title: Need help with client
channel.description:
Ok when I try to run any client but the moparscape one i get this error
[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command operable program or batch file[/code]
I have forwarded all the ports and I have the latest JRE and JDK so idk whats wrong[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 07, 2007, 08:35:21 PM[/size][hr]still need help
